frames.caption: A woman in historical attire sits amidst the ruins of a burned-down building, holding a sleeping child in her arms. The charred remains of the structure and small fires are visible in the background, casting an orange glow in the dim light. The scene conveys a sense of loss and resilience.
frames.description: The scene is set in the aftermath of a destructive fire, with a woman and child at the center, surrounded by the ruins of a once-standing building. The setting appears historical, suggested by the clothing and architecture.

frames.caption: A woman sits on the ground amidst the ruins of a destroyed village, holding a young child closely. The remnants of burnt buildings surround them, casting a somber atmosphere over the scene.
frames.description: The scene depicts a post-disaster setting in a village that has been devastated by fire or conflict. The woman and child are the focal point, conveying a sense of loss and protection in the aftermath of destruction.

frames.caption: A woman sits on the ground, cradling a child in her arms amidst the ruins of a destroyed building. The scene is filled with debris and charred remnants, indicating a recent disaster. The woman appears to be comforting the child, creating a poignant moment of solace in a desolate setting.
frames.description: The scene depicts a post-disaster setting with a woman and child amidst the ruins of a building. The environment is filled with debris, suggesting destruction and loss.

summary: People: woman, child. Objects: ruins, debris, fire, building. Actions: sitting, holding, cradling. Emotions: sadness, resilience, somber, protective, comfort. Scenes: post-disaster, ruins, destruction, aftermath. Concepts: loss, destruction, survival, aftermath
